page.title: 07Ghosts In Painswick
page.content: The ghosts of the Fiery Beacon Gallery was seen eight years ago.There was a big bright light at the end of a corridor.This part of the building has now been closed off because all the floor_boards are rotten.They say that the ghost could have come from outside because all the village folk were standing around with fiery torches to burn the church down, many years ago. The ghost at the Little Fleece book shop is supposed to be an old man called Mr Clutterbuck.He is supposed to be looking for buried treasure.None of the people living in the house over the last twenty_five years have seen him.The dog and cat who live there now, have never shown a ghostly presence.The haunted cellar is believed to have housed prisoners at the time of the civil war.
